translations: n.[临床]内窥镜（endoscope 的复数）；内视镜

phrs.translation: 国针镜, 具有专利的中国针镜, 套管针镜简介

sentences.sentence: Objective To know the quality of cleaning and disinfection of endoscopes in our hospital.
sentences.translation: 目的了解内镜清洗消毒质量，比较不同清洗消毒方法效果。

sentences.sentence: Also, the scanners could also be adapted to endoscopes, enabling views of internal organs.
sentences.translation: 此外，这个扫描装置也可以适应内窥镜，可以看到内部器官。

sentences.sentence: Endoscopes were inserted into the lumen of the sinus to observe the structures of chordae.
sentences.translation: 应用内窥镜研究窦腔内纤维索结构、蛛网膜颗粒及窦汇区的原始结构特征；
